title: Type Supply News - September 2007
content:
Hello Typophile,

I have a few announcements to make...

I have decided to open source a bunch of code that I have written for various type development tools. You can learn more at [code.typesupply.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014225006/http:/code.typesupply.com/) You might find the [FontLab Scripts](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014225006/http:/code.typesupply.com/wiki/FontLabScripts) and the [FeatureProof application](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014225006/http:/code.typesupply.com/wiki/FeatureProof) to be particularly useful.

In other news, I launched a new Type Supply website at [typesupply.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014225006/http:/typesupply.com/) and started a blog at [talleming.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014225006/http:/talleming.com/).

That's all for now. Have fun!
author: Tal Leming
